00051 
00052         if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('t3getid3')) {
00053             require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('t3getid3').'getid3/getid3.php');
00054         } else {
00055             die('GetID3() Library not loaded!');
00056         }
00057

00059         $getID3 = t3lib_div::makeInstance('getID3');
00060 
00061         // Analyze file
00062         if (file_exists($path))
00063         {
00064             $fileInformation = $getID3->Analyze($path);
00065             getid3_lib::CopyTagsToComments($fileInformation);
00066 
00067             return array(
00068                 'filename'=>$fileInformation['filename'],
00069                 'bitrate'=>$fileInformation['bitrate'],
00070                 'samplerate'=>$fileInformation['audio']['sample_rate'],

00082             return false;
00083         }

00095             require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('t3getid3').'getid3/getid3.php');

00104         if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('t3getid3')) {
00105             require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('t3getid3').'getid3/write.php');

00130                 if (!empty($tagwriter->warnings)) {
00131                     return implode('\n', $tagwriter->warnings);
00132                 } else {
00133                     return true;
00134                 }
